dmca.title: [ABUSE] Site(s) you are hosting is using stolen content
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 2004 9:31 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Site(s) you are hosting is using stolen content


Fowarding to Legal for review.

-- 
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: MelodyAnnS@aol.com <MelodyAnnS@aol.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Monday, October 11, 2004, 11:49:02 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] Site(s) you are hosting is using stolen content

===8<==============Original message text===============
Hello, my name is Melody Shephard. I am writing to report a site(s) on your 
server that has been using
stolen content of mine for the past 3 months. http://www.plumpercuties.com
3 months ago he was told by me to remove 2 sites that were mine.
This was after an ongoing problem of not getting paid on time. He told me
the 
sites were removed.
Well, I discovered last night that for the past 3 months he still had all my

content up in his members area.
After talking to him today (which I have the whole conversation saved with 
timestamps if you would like to read it - he admits to still having the
content 
up for the past three months and that he "forgot" to remove it)
I tried reasoning with him and telling him I would accept 180.00 for the
past 
3 months and give him permission to continue to use the content. He refuses 
to listen to reason.
Well, I just found more of my content up on his site(s) which he says has 
been taken down! He asked where it was, I refuse to tell him, because IF HE
DOES 
NOT KNOW WHERE HE HAS MY CONTENT HE HAS NO BUSINESS BEING A WEBMASTER!
Now, he has used my content illegally for 3 months and is continuing to do 
so. I want one of 2 things done. Either
his sites be taken down immediately  or he reimburses me for all this time
of 
using my content illegally.
If this is not accomplished within a few days, I will take him and you to 
court (as you are hosting his sites)
Melody Shephard

===8<===========End of original message text===========
